onboarding_title_1: No more going to the store!
onboarding_description_1: Get the product you want in seconds by ordering from our app!
onboarding_title_2: The abundance of variety will make you happy!
onboarding_description_2: We have both a lot of variety and a lot of quantity!
onboarding_description_3: Buy all the products you order in a more affordable way with cashbacks waiting for you in next payments!
